column2: "Take a breath, and from count from 1 to 20"
"Take a deep breath, and say ah for as long and as steadily as you can."
"Take a deep breath, and repeat puh-puh-puh for as long and as steadily as you can"
"Take a deep breath, and repeat tuh-tuh-tuh for as long and as steadily as you can"
"Take a deep breath, and repeat  kuh-kuh-kuh for as long and as steadily as you can"
"Take a deep breath, and repeat puh-tuh-kuh for as long and as steadily as you can"
"Please put the groceries in the refrigerator."
"The shipwreck washed up on the shore."
"Now you will hear some words that are not real words but sound like they might be. Repeat these words after me."   -   splant
